summary: Implemented super admin functionality to manage /app and /client from /admin. Created authentication middleware, database query functions, API routes for organizations/users/clients, and frontend management pages. Added navigation links in sidebar. All routes require super_admin role authentication.
current_status: Super admin management system complete. Backend API routes created with authentication. Frontend pages for organizations, users, and clients management ready. Navigation links added to sidebar. User needs to: 1) Set up login endpoint to get JWT tokens, 2) Create super_admin user in database, 3) Configure VITE_API_URL in admin/.env.local
